response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity to own an item that holds significant value for you, estimated at $12,000. We understand its importance and would like to extend this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, we are offering this exceptional product at a special price of $9,500. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
